bill.summary:
Natural Gas Pipeline Public Health Protection Act of 2017
This bill suspends construction of natural gas facilities that have been issued a certificate of public convenience and necessity by the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission until violations relating to air quality are remediated.
It applies to a holder of a certificate that has not commenced construction of a facility for which such certificate was issued within the previous two years.
